name: The Lost Elephant
description:
Brunel Digital - Degree Show 2018/19 Winner - BEST Game Design and Development

The Lost Elephant was created during the final year of University and was sumbitted as a project piece.

Inspiration for the story/art brief was provided by Hindu mythology - two deity companions, Dalra and Kerwan, are persued by the demon Druwan, who is jelous of their friendship. Unable to control his jealousy, Druwan corrupts Kerwan into a crazed elephant who attacks Dalra.

Not wanting to kill her friend, Dalra orders a temple to be built to imprison Kerwan but to also honour the friend she has lost.
